page.title: 14Braithwell-Leisure
page.content: The Youth Club organised by Doncaster Education Authority is held twice weekly for children over 12 years in the School Hall. The Working Men's Club opens during licensing hours. It has a large hall which accomodates weekly entertainment and a Disco Club for young people every Thursday. Yoga classes are held weekly in the village. A variety of sporting activities are held regulary on the Playing Field. The Netball,Football, Bowling,and Cricket Clubs play friendly matches with other local clubs. The Rotherham Chantry Rifle Club has been established for 40 years and has 60 members. The club meets weekly and shoots every Thursday at a new indoor shooting range. Two members represent Britain in shooting competitions, one of which represented Britain in the 1984 Olympic Games.
